clientSide.stubs

Class PlaygroundStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.PlaygroundStub

  • public class PlaygroundStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Playground Stub It instaniates a remote refererence to the Playground Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

      • assertTrialDecision

        public boolean assertTrialDecision()
        Referee will compare the strength of the teams and decide if the trial has ended. false : trial has ended true : trial has not ended
        Returns:
